item.title: HUMAN is Live!
item.description: Yes, HUMAN is Live and Available on Amazon! In this world full of open questions and uncertainty HUMAN is the story of people engaging to cope with what they perceive and experience. This future world is easy, yet strange to live in as a human. Queen with its AI-powered, mysterious operations is providing people virtually everything. The role of a human being is to enjoy. New controlling orders, regular bright light sessions and queen bots raise suspicions.
